item.title: Hello World, The Infrastructure Guy
item.description: Objective The objective of this post is to build a website using Hugo and Github Pages. Steps Create a Github account if you do not have Create a Github Repository Go through Hugo’s Quickstart Guide Go though Hugo on Github Set up Github Action workflow Go through Github Pages, and Settings Profit Reference Here are list of links I refered to make this happen: Markdown Guide Goldmark Mardown [Hugo Quick Start] (https://gohugo.
